mapper.select: SELECT EH.seq, EH.brand, EH.segment, EH.model, EH.trim, EH.options, EH.items, EH.start_date, EH.end_date, EH.memo, EH.take_place_code, EH.take_place_basic, EH.take_place_detail, EH.gen_date, EH.upt_date, BC.name AS brand_name, MC.name AS model_name, MC.img AS model_img, TC.name AS trim_name, TC.fuel AS trim_fuel, CS.name AS segment_name, M.seq AS mem_seq FROM (SELECT * FROM estimate_history WHERE seq = #{seq} ) EH LEFT OUTER JOIN brand_code BC ON EH.brand = BC.code LEFT OUTER JOIN model_code MC ON EH.model = MC.code LEFT OUTER JOIN trim_code TC ON EH.trim = TC.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub CS ON EH.segment = CS.code LEFT OUTER JOIN member M ON EH.mem_seq = M.seq
